items.sentence: If you'd parked your car here, you'd have been fined.
I don't know whether Tom is telling the truth or not.
The only way to find out what happened is to ask Tom.
Before dying, he spent more than a month in hospital.
Now that you mention it, I haven't seen Tom recently.
That organization depends on voluntary contributions.
Someone is going to get punished. I hope it isn't me.
The only foreign language I'm very good at is French.
Tom didn't want anybody to visit him in the hospital.
I must think the matter over before giving my answer.
